comments: In 1989 this author was based in Herb. CHA, Changli, Hebei Province.  Definitely different Chinese characters from the author with the standard form 'Li Bing Zhang' - see publication below and Bibliogr. Chinese Syst. Bot. (1949-1990), 1993.
examples: Armeniaca sibirica var. multipetala G.S.Liu & L.B.Zhang in Acta Phytotax. Sin.  27(5): 394 (1989)
